runs.comm: Ashwin starts with a delivery on middle and leg from round the wicket, defended
some bounce her for Ashwin, hits Akmal high on the bat as he blocks towards square leg
Pakistan are away, Kamran pounces on the short ball, getting on one knee and powerfully swatting that away behind square leg, a lofted shot for four
fuller and on off stump this time, defended off the front foot
same length, on middle stump this time, more watchful blocking
blocked to the right of the bowler to end the over
starts with a ball on middle stump, clipped towards deep backward square leg by Shehzad
a full ball this time, it is pushed off the front foot towards the bowler
short of length ball outside off, 133kph, looking to chop that past point, a thick bottom edge sends the ball rolling in that direction
lovely placement from Kamran Akmal, it is a packed field around point, but he still finds the gap, that's his second boundary

Kamran Akmal is usually involved in comedy wicketkeeping, this time it is a comical mix-up, not his fault though, he charged down the track looking to work the ball to the leg side, doesn't connect and the ball dribbles to the off side, he wanted a leg-bye, Shehzad also did, at least till he took two or three paces, after which Shehzad decided he didn't want one, Akmal was a long way down, Bhuvneshwar has plenty of time to take aim, he hits, the stumps are flashing and Akmal is on his way

oh dear, what's happening out there? nearly another run-out there, another attempted leg-bye, this time towards the leg side, this time Shehzad was very enthusiastic, though Hafeez wasn't, Shehzad was halfway down the track before he had to scamper back, luckily for him there's no direct hit
defended to the leg side
worked towards square leg for a single
length ball on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards mid-off
down the wicket and he defends
length ball is swept from leg stump towards deep backward square leg
boundary to finish the over, Shehzad skips down the track and absolutely clobbers that down the ground, just wideof mid-on but that had too much pace for the fielder there
the first ball is left alone outside off, good length from Shami
short of length ball is defended towards mid-on, that was 143kph from Shami
length ball on off stump, poked past point for a single
same length, getting some bounce here, again hitting high on the blade as that is worked away towards midwicket
driven on the up towards cover, no timing on it and it dribbles to the fielder

more misunderstanding between the batsmen, again it is after the batsman fails to make contact and is looking for a leg-bye, the ball rolls in the direction of point, Shami does the fielding, Hafeez and Shehzad take a start before turning back
seams away outside off, goes for the wild heave, no connection
a wide down the leg side from Bhuvneshwar
a bottom edge as another big hit is attempted, the ball fizzes behind square leg
full ball is driven towards mid-on, again timing is awry
length ball, a touch slower, 119kph, just outside off, defended to the leg side, Hafeez 2 off 11 now
a lofted flick towards deep midwicket, Kohli ives chases and hauls it back
tapped towards midwicket for an easy single

dropped by Yuvraj Singh at deep midwicket, Hafeez plants his front foot forward and swats the ball to the leg side, not quite off the middle, Yuvraj has work to do, he manages to get under the ball but it was a low chance ahead of him, couldn't pouch it

an awkward shot for four, Shehzad skips away from the stumps, the bowler follows him, there's no room but Shehzad manages to squeezes it through the covers, the timing wasn't perfect either but the ball runs away for four
a thick outside edge and the ball flies down towards third man
moves across the stumps and looks to paddle that back of length ball, doesn't make contact
whipped to the wide long-on boundary, why go for the fancy paddle sweeps when you can do this, powerfully driven for four
another muscular stroke to the leg side, towards midwicket
length ball spins away slightly, pitching well outside off, driven towards cover
flighted legbreak, pitched up and that is defended uppishly off the front foot
full ball is drilled towards long-off for a single
flighted again, this is turned into a low full toss by the batsman skipping down the track, driven to long-on
full ball, a cross-batted swipe towards deep midwicket for a single
flatter one, sliding towards leg stump, pushed towards long-on and they push for two
Jadeja starts with a full ball on the pads, squeezed towards midwicket
backs away and chops this towards third man, Ashwin gives chase and makes a diving stop, lunging forward face first to cut that off, well doen by a man not known for his athletic fielding

Jadeja can do no wrong, he gets a wicket in his first over, Hafeez holes out, the extra bounce in the track doing the trick, Hafeez looking for a big shot, gets a top edge and the ball swirls towards deep cover, Bhuvneshwar Kuamr runs in from the deep and takes a sharp catch
full ball is driven towards long-off for a single
spinning away outside off, a shortish ball, patted towards point for a single
skids on towards middle, tapped off the back foot towards the bowler

and Mishra strikes with a classic legbreak, Shehzad dances down the track, doesn't get near the pitch, the turn takes the ball past the outside edge, Dhoni completes one of the easier stumpings of his career, Pakistan in a bit of bother now, that was a lovely delivery from Mishra, showing you don't have to keep bowling darts to succeed in T20
flighted delivery, pitched up, and that is driven towards mid-off
careful defence off the front foot by Malik
heading for middle stump, defended off the front foot, a maiden coming up for Mishra?
yup, it's a wicket maiden, the final ball is poked just past slip, well done Mishra
down the leg side, guided to short fine leg, that was a very tight single
flat delivery, on a length around off, blocked off the front foot towards cover
an outside edge as Jadeja gives it some air and gets a hint of turn, ball nearly carries to slip
on the pads, tapped towards square leg for a single to bring up Pakistan's 50
full ball is driven back towards the bowler
blocked off the front foot
flighted full toss well outside off, sliced towards sweeper cover
swatted towards deep midwicket, should have been only two, but <del>he</del> Bhuvneshwar makes a hash of a simple fielding, let's the ball through to the boundary
guided towards deep point for a single
defended off the front foot towards cover for a tight single
full ball well outside off, driven past sweeper cover for four, nicely struck off the front foot, the Yuvraj experiment not working here, Pakistan getting plenty in this over
gets well back in the crease and stylishly tucks the ball towards midwicket for a single
steered off the back foot towards deep backward point
flighted length ball is nudged towards square leg for a single

Malik has had enough of pottering around, he charges down and powers that over the bowler's head,he gets right to the pitch, gives it everything, clears the rope comfortably, he had been 2 off 8 before this, so the pressure is off
eased towards long-off for a single
waits for the ball to arrive and guides it towards third man
plenty of air there, the legspinner from Mishra is pushed towards extra cover for a single
on the pads, tapped behind square leg
slides it down the leg side, clipped behind square leg once more, this time they get two
full ball on the pads, squeezed out to square leg, no pace on the shot so they have time to steal the second
the carrom ball spins away towards off, plays it with an open face towards point
plays the carrom ball with soft hands, guiding towards point for a single
full ball on off stump, eased towards mid-on, bhaag Jaddu Dhoni screams, and Jadeja sets off in pursuit
on the pads, nudged towards midwicket this time
quicker one, short of length and just outside off, defended towards point, a rare dot ball
what's was that? Jadeja is usually the most accurate of bowlers, the ball slipped from his hand this time and ended as a spectacular wide down the leg side
towards point for a single
short of length ball, spins away, defended off the back foot towards point
angled in towards off stump, defended to the off side once more
full and on the pads, patted towards midwicket
stays back in the crease and whips the ball off the thigh pad towards square leg
full ball on the leg side, helped along to short fine leg, Umar wanted one there and set off, Shoaib slower to react
pushed towards mid-on for a single
full ball, the batsman skips down the track and pushes the ball towards mid-off

another mistake in the field by Bhuvneshwar, that is swiped towards midwicket, Bhuvneshwar wanted to go for the catch but that lands well short of him, he dives forward as he tries to stop it, but he can't and concedes the boundary
length ball on leg stump, patted towards square leg for a single
Mishra gets another one, Malik wants to repeat the six he hit in Mishra's previous over, he can't get it far enough this time, holes out to long-off and the partnership is broken
full ball on legstump, defended towards mid-on for a single
length ball down the leg side, off the pads and past Dhoni for a leg-bye
the legbreak from Mishra, a touch short, worked towards mid-on by Umar to bring up the 100 for Pakistan
length ball spinning away, Afridi waits in the crease and pokes it towards cover for a single, Mishra finishes with 4-1-22-2, outstanding figures in a high-pressure contest
short of length ball on off stump, pushed back towards Jadeja
outside off  this time, guided towards short third man
nearly a wicket there, a leading edge as Afridi looks to whip the ball to the leg side, the ball nearly carries to the bowler
towards point for a single, this is turning out to be a good ooer from Jadeja
guided towards point, but no run this time
Dhoni goes up in appeal as Akmal looks to work the ball down the ground, he misses and is hit on the pads, but that was going down leg
full ball from Shami, drilled towards long-on for a single

a leading edge, the ball soars towards long-off, Raina waits under that one, takes it comfortably, another big wicket as Umar Akmal departs, he was looking to go towards long-on, but miscues it, Pakistan need Afridi magic now
an appeal for lbw, as Afridi doesn't connect as he looks to paddle the ball, struck outside off
full ball just outside off, slapped towards long-off for a single
bouncer to welcome the new man, Maqsood gets out of the way of that one, good thinking from Shami
a full toss this time, 138kph, should have been put away, but Maqsood new to the crease and he can't slap it away, pushed back to the left of the bowler
Bhuvenshwar keeps it full, somehow Afridi squeezes it towards square leg, Shami the man at long leg reacted late, didn't pick it early on, and by then it is too late for him to cut it off
a low full toss is thumped towards long-off, reaches the man there on the bounce
misses the yorker, Maqsood can get under that one, gets his front leg out of the way and thumps that straight down the ground for four
a low full toss outside off, a thick inside edge sends the ball towards mid-on

there's no Afridi magic, with the bat at least, Raina gets his third catch of the innings and Afridi is on his way, looking to swat that off the front foot, a bit of a top edge and it carries to deep midwicket, Raina nearly let this one through, just hangs on though, with the tips of his fingers
a low full toss on middle stump, clubbed towards deep midwicket
what a shot from Maqsood, shortish ball outside off, this was around chest height, Maqsood is on the backfoot as he clobbers that over long-off, Raina watches it sail over him
towards midwicket, they chance a second and get it
a 139kph low full toss, superbly struck by Maqsood, hammered over the bowler's head for four more, 12 off the first three
doesn't time it this time, towards long-on and he has time to get the second, Maqsood back on strike
short of length ball well outside off, not so far from the stumps to be called a wide, Maqsood swings and misses

superb bit of fielding from Jadeja, Maqsood sends the ball towards long-on, Bhatti has left early and is back easily for the second, Jadeja has to go for the long throw, and he fires it in perfectly for Dhoni, who breaks the stumps before Maqsood can get back
